Class Card

java.lang.Object
com.lucas.ticketsalesmanager.models.paymentMethod.Payment
com.lucas.ticketsalesmanager.models.paymentMethod.Card
public class Card extends Payment
The Card class represents a payment method using a credit or debit card. It contains information such as card number, CVV, expiration date, and card type.

    • validate

      public boolean validate(String paymentDetails)
      Validates the payment details for the card.
      Specified by:
      validate in class Payment
      Parameters:
      paymentDetails - The details to validate (should be the CVV).
      Returns:
      true if the CVV is correct and the card is not expired, false otherwise.

    • executePayment

      public boolean executePayment()
      Executes the payment process for the card.
      Specified by:
      executePayment in class Payment
      Returns:
      true if the payment was successful, false otherwise.
